prontera,163,135,3	script	แลก Cash เป็น Card	564,{
	.@cash_price = 50;
	menu "แลก 1 อัน",L_Once,"ใส่จำนวน",L_Input,"แลกทั้งหมด",L_AllIn;
	
	L_Once:
	.@i = 1;
	goto L_Loop;

	L_Input:
	input .@i;
	goto L_Loop;
	
	L_AllIn:
	.@i = 999999;
	.@all_in = 1;
	goto L_Loop;
	
	L_Loop:
	getinventorylist;
	.@inventory_count = @inventorylist_count;
	
	.@sum_cash = #CASHPOINTS;
	
	.@max_rand = .@sum_cash / .@cash_price;
	
	if(.@i > .@max_rand)
	.@i = .@max_rand;

	if(.@inventory_count + .@i > 100 && .@all_in)
	.@i = 100 - .@inventory_count;

	if(.@inventory_count + .@i > 100){
		mes "คุณต้องการสุ่ม " + .@i + " ครั้ง";
		mes "แต่ช่องว่าง ภายในกระเป๋าของคุณไม่เพียงพอ โปรดทำช่องว่างเพิ่ม " + .@i + " ช่อง";
		close;
	}
	
	while(.@i > 0 && #CASHPOINTS >= .@cash_price){
		.@rand_card = .all_card[rand(0,getarraysize(.all_card)-1)];
		
		if(!checkweight(.@rand_card,1))
		break;
		
		.@i--;
		
		#CASHPOINTS -= .@cash_price;
		
		getitem .@rand_card,1;
	}
	end;
	
OnInit:
	setarray .all_card[0],4001,4002,4003,4004,4005,4006,4007,4008,4009,4010,4011,4012,4013,4014,4015,4016,4017,4018,4019,4020,4021,4022,4023,4024,4025,4026,4027,4028,4029,4030,4031,4032,4033,4034,4035,4036,4037,4038,4039,4040,4041,4042,4043,4044,4045,4046,4047,4048,4049,4050,4051,4052,4053,4054,4055,4056,4057,4058,4059,4060,4061,4062,4063,4064,4065,4066,4067,4068,4069,4070,4071,4072,4073,4074,4075,4076,4077,4078,4079,4080,4081,4082,4083,4084,4085,4086,4087,4088,4089,4090,4091,4092,4093,4094,4095,4096,4097,4098,4099,4100,4101,4102,4103,4104,4105,4106,4107,4108,4109,4110,4111,4112,4113,4114,4115,4116,4117,4118,4119,4120,4121,4122,4123,4124,4125,4126,4127,4128,4129,4130,4131,4132,4133,4134,4135,4136,4137,4138,4139,4140,4141,4142,4143,4144,4145,4146,4147,4148,4149,4150,4151,4152,4153,4154,4155,4156,4157,4158,4159,4160,4161,4162,4163,4164,4165,4166,4167,4168,4169,4170,4171,4172,4173,4174,4175,4176,4177,4178,4179,4180,4181,4182,4183,4184,4185,4186,4187,4188,4189,4190,4191,4192,4193,4194,4195,4196,4197,4198,4199,4200,4201,4202,4203,4204,4205,4206,4207,4208,4209,4210,4211,4212,4213,4214,4215,4216,4217,4218,4219,4220,4221,4222,4223,4224,4225,4226,4227,4228,4229,4230,4231,4232,4233,4234,4235,4236,4237,4238,4239,4240,4241,4242,4243,4244,4245,4246,4247,4248,4249,4250,4251,4252,4253,4254,4255,4256,4257,4258,4259,4260,4261,4262,4263,4264,4265,4266,4267,4268,4269,4270,4271,4272,4273,4274,4275,4276,4277,4278,4279,4280,4281,4282,4283,4284,4285,4286,4287,4288,4289,4290,4291,4292,4293,4294,4295,4296,4297,4298,4299,4300,4301,4302,4303,4304,4305,4306,4307,4308,4309,4310,4311,4312,4313,4314,4315,4316,4317,4318,4319,4320,4321,4322,4323,4324,4325,4326,4327,4328,4329,4330,4331,4332,4333,4334,4335,4336,4337,4338,4339,4340,4341,4342,4343,4344,4345,4346,4347,4348,4349,4350,4351,4352,4353,4354,4355,4356,4357,4358,4359,4360,4361,4362,4363,4364,4365,4366,4367,4368,4369,4370,4371,4372,4373,4374,4375,4376,4377,4378,4379,4380,4381,4382,4383,4384,4385,4386,4387,4388,4389,4390,4391,4392,4393,4394,4395,4396,4397,43 55,27256,27257,27258,27259,27260,27261,27262,27263,27264,27265,27286,27287,27288,27289,27290,27291,27292,27293,27294,27295,27296,27297,27298,27301,27304,27305,27306,27307,27308,27309,27310,27311,27312,27313,27314,27315,27316,27317,27318,27319,27320,27321,27322,27323,27324,27325,27326,27327,27328,27330,27331,27332,27333,27334,27335,27336,27337,27338,27339,27340,27341,27342,27343,27346,27347,27348,27349,27350,27351,27352,27353,27354,27355,27356,27357,27358,27359,27360,27361,27362,27363,27381,27382,27383,27384,27385,27386,27387,27388,31006,31007,31008,31009,31010,31011,31012,31013,31014,31015,31016,31017,31018,31019,31020,31021,31022,31023,31024,31025,31026,300001,300002,300003,300004,300005,300006,300007,300008,300009,300010,300011,300012,300013,300014,300015,300016,300017,300018,300019,300020,300021,300076,300077,300078,300079,300080,300081,300082,300083,300084,300085,300086,300087,300088,300089,300090,300091,300092,300093,300094,300095,300096,300097,300098,300099,300100,300101,300102,300103,300104,300105,300106,300107,300108,300109,300110,300111,300112,300113,300114,300115,300116,300117,300118,300119,300120,300121,300122,300123,300124,300125,300127,300128,300129,300130,300140,300141,300142,300143,300144,300145,300146,300147,300148,300149,300150,300151,4001,4002,4003,4004,4005,4006,4007,4008,4009,4010,4011,4012,4013,4014,4015,4016,4017,4018,4019,4020,4021,4022,4023,4024,4025,4026,4027,4028,4029,4030,4031,4032,4033,4034,4035,4036,4037,4038,4039,4040,4041,4042,4043,4044,4045,4046,4047,4048,4049,4050,4051,4052,4053,4054,4055,4056,4057,4058,4059,4060,4061,4062,4063,4064,4065,4066,4067,4068,4069,4070,4071,4072,4073,4074,4075,4076,4077,4078,4079,4080,4081,4082,4083,4084,4085,4086,4087,4088,4089,4090,4091,4092,4093,4094,4095,4096,4097,4098,4099,4100,4101,4102,4103,4104,4105,4106,4107,4108,4109,4110,4111,4112,4113,4114,4115,4116,4117,4118,4119,4120,4121,4122,4123,4124,4125,4126,4127,4128,4129,4130,4131,4132,4133,4134,4135,4136,4137,4138,4139,4140,4141,4142,4143,4144,4145,414 	waitingroom "50 Cash เป็น Card",0;
	end;
}
